revised_title: Discovery of Iridium and Osmium in Black Powder Residue from Platina
tldr: The author, Smithson Tennant, discovered two new metals, iridium and osmium, in the black powder residue from platina. These metals have unique properties and can be combined with other metals to form alloys. The author describes the methods used to separate and analyze these metals, as well as their reactions with various substances.
